Text.Name: Bear_Fat
Text.Desc: Born with a large amount of fat, providing rather good cold-resistance and strong resistance against Five Elements.

Text.Name: Rabbit_Fast
Text.Desc: Very fast running speed and learning speed, but with an impatient mentality.

Text.Name: Rabbit_Hear
Text.Desc: Has very sensitive ears and great perception.

Text.Name: Chicken_Sleep
Text.Desc: Born with a very short sleep cycle, very hardworking.

Text.Name: Wolf_Calm
Text.Desc: Natural born fighter, with superior combat talents beyond human limits.

Text.Name: Snake_Progenitor
Text.Desc: In ancient times, cultivators of snake demon tried to shapeshift their bodies into a form resembling dragons, and ended up getting prosecuted by the dragon race and almost went extinct. Therefore, they did not leave much of a secret technique of body refining behind. However, it allowed them to possess a high level of perception and talent of Qi beyond that of common people.

Text.Name: Frog
Text.Desc: Born with a body of strong resilience.

Text.Name: Frog_Vision
Text.Desc: Their small size allows frogs to be more aware of trivial things and be more attentive to details in crafting.

Text.Name: Boar
Text.Desc: Eat everything, digest them well, and convert food into Stamina more easily.

Text.Name: Snake
Text.Desc: Naturally born with strong Blessing.

Text.Name: Wolf
Text.Desc: Being a gregarious animal makes very good at cooperating with others.

Text.Name: Cat_Elegant
Text.Desc: It's hard to resist their natural charm.

Text.Name: Cat_Elegant
Text.Desc: Hardly make any sound when walking, and very good at hiding.

Text.Name: Tor_Longevity
Text.Desc: They have a very long Lifespan.

Text.Name: Tor_Slow
Text.Desc: Turtles are very slow animals, but they maintain a good mentality, and consume food and water slower as well.

Text.Name: Tor_Def
Text.Desc: Turtles naturally have very strong defense.

Text.Name: Tiger_Pier
Text.Desc: Very fierce and good at fighting. This aggressiveness is also of great help to Sword Mastery.

Text.Name: Cow_Farmer
Text.Desc: Naturally hardworking and good at farming.

Text.Name: Cow_Big
Text.Desc: It has a unique digestive system, which grants it a greater understanding of the qualities of herbs far beyond others.

Text.Name: Cat_Pot
Text.Desc: Cats are naturally curious about the unknown, which is a very important quality in cultivation.
